title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: A classic romance novel set in rural England, focusing on the themes of love, marriage, and social status.

title: A big part to you
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: The first part of the epic fantasy series, following Frodo Baggins as he sets out on a quest to destroy the One Ring.

title: Aldous Huxley book
author: Aldous Huxley
description: A dystopian novel set in a futuristic world where individuality and creativity are suppressed in favor of stability and conformity.

title: The Road
author: Cormac McCarthy
description: Follows a father and his young son as they journey through a post-apocalyptic world, facing numerous dangers and challenges.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
author: Stieg Larsson

title: Gone Girl
author: Gillian Flynn
description: A psychological thriller novel that follows the mysterious disappearance of a woman named Amy Dunne and the subsequent media frenzy.

title: The Martian
author: Andy Weir
description: Follows astronaut Mark Watney, who is stranded on Mars and must use his ingenuity and resourcefulness to survive until rescue.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A novel depicting the experiences of Holden Caulfield, a disenchanted teenager in New York City.

title: Lord of the Flies 2
author: William Golding
description: A novel about a group of boys stranded on an uninhabited island and their descent into savagery.
